title: Quaker Oats font
content:
Hey everyone,

Does anyone know anything about the Quaker Oats typeface? I'm pretty rusty on this stuff and couldn't really think of anything to match..

Here's a link to an image if it helps

[http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/b/bf/QuakerOats.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20120216023957/http:/upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/b/bf/QuakerOats.png "http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/b/bf/QuakerOats.png")

Thanks!
author: v-six

comments.content: Akira is a rookie on fire.
